translations: n.命运；预先注定；宿命论，得救预定论

phrs.translation: 预定论, 宿命论, 前目的地
遇上你是我的缘, 我的缘, 遇上你是我的错

sentences.sentence: Would you accept the concept of predestination ?
sentences.translation: 你可以接受宿命的概念吗？

sentences.sentence: See how powerless is the human will against predestination!
sentences.translation: 请看人类反抗命运的意志是多么脆弱无力啊！

sentences.sentence: Some lose is predestined some predestination can never have the result.
sentences.translation: 有些失去是注定的，有些缘分是永远不会有结果的。
